name: Star Harvest (Geckoo1337)
description:
Hello. This is my entry for the 52nd LudumDare - a casual game. You have to collect stars in the universe clicking in order to create a first explosion. This way you create a chain reaction. You have to collect for each level more than 75% of existing stars on screen. All has be done using my own template in C++. There is a LEADERBOARD on-line to rival with other players. Have fun. Thank you for playing ++

Web Page for LeaderBoard available here :

http://dreamlo.com/lb/63ba871b8f40bb10701b6855/pipe
